resources.string: Retail 118 is a great platform for both retailers and sellers to source products in a much convenient manner whereby products can be searched and viewed using both our website and our mobile application with the click of a button.

Our platform allows all retailers and suppliers to have a well-documented transaction whereby invoices are generated for each transaction made and full details of the transaction can also be sent directly to ones email.

This platform also comes with great retailer and buyer protection policies which are documented in the terms and conditions below. The payment and collection protection policy can also be referred to.

Retail 118 operates as online wholesale city that connecting supplier (Factory, distributors, Wholesalers) with buyer (Retailer and Reseller) to perform trading with secure and easy way. For Buyers, benefit of browsing many products with click of a button from mobile and computers.

- To provide the best ecommerce place to increase productivity and reduce cost in Malaysia. - To provide the best E-commerce website for user - sourcing, and costing. - Information Technology should lower operation cost, Increase Efficiency.

"Moto 360 stays true to the timeless form of the classic wristwatch. A round ... That's why all the leather used for Moto 360 comes from American leather crafters.
The 203 Series is a comprehensive update of the 200 collection. With many design details drawn from the 302 Series chrongraph, the 203 Series still maintains reference to the engineering dials it was inspired by. The 40mm two-part case features a lugless design and a chamfered bezel."
